channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🟡 19:08 Repulse of the alarm in the Kharkiv region. Please note, the alarm is still in progress in:- Kupyan district- Lipetsk territorial community- Vovchan territorial community
item.description: 🟡 19:08 Repulse of the alarm in the Kharkiv region. Please note, the alarm is still in progress in:- Kupyan district- Lipetsk territorial community- Vovchan territorial community#Харківська_область This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent air-based attack or other threat.
